title: MOVE IN READY!!
posting_body: 5600 East Russell Road , Las Vegas, NV, 89122
The Best of Modern Apartment Living
Welcome home to The Presley at Whitney Ranch in eastern Las Vegas, Nevada!
Conveniently located between Vegas and Henderson, everything you need is within reach, including the world-famous Las Vegas Strip.
Instant access to the I-515 makes for an easy commute into the heart of the city.
Enjoy nearby recreation at Clark County Wetlands Park, or explore the variety of shopping malls like the Galleria At Sunset, delicious dining options, and entertainment venues.
Let us be your gateway to all the wonders of the valley.
Two pets maximum with a limit of 70 pounds or less.
For 1 pet, $0 Pet deposit / $300 non-refundable Pet Fee / $30 monthly pet rent.
For 2 pets, $0 Pet deposit / $500 non-refundable Pet Fee / $50 monthly pet rent.
